title: Tips to Manage Loss & Anxiety from Dr. Gail Saltz and Dr. Jo Ann McKarus
description:
Jillian’s mom Dr. Jo Ann McKarus talks to Jillian about grief and loss. And Dr. Gail Saltz returns to the show to help us understand how fear brings out all kinds of extreme behaviors that divide us; plus, how to reduce anxiety about the country re-opening.

Guest Link: DrGailSaltz.com, Twitter: @DrGailSalt

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
